channel.title: How do i make portals
channel.description: how do i make portals so when ppkl log in they can tele to different places?

item.title: How do i make portals
item.dc:creator: @eczema3 eczema3
item.description:
@eczema3 wrote:

but make sure you havent already used the portal, because then when you addthe case it will become a duplicate and you iwll have to start the portal agani

item.title: How do i make portals
item.dc:creator: @veki94 veki94
item.description:
@veki94 wrote:

The globalobject under this [code]public void makeGlobalObject(int x, int y, int typeID, int orientation, int tileObjectType){ //Makes Global objects
for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players){
if(p != null){
client person = (client)p;
if((person.playerName != null || person.playerName != “null”)){
if(person.distanceToPoint(x, y) <= 60){
person.createNewTileObject(x, y, typeID, orientation, tileObjectType);
}
}
}
}
}

public void NewObjects() {[/code]

And the case,just put it where other cases are.

Read full topic

item.title: How do i make portals
item.dc:creator: @veki94 veki94
item.description:
@veki94 wrote:

First add an object.(e.g makeGlobalObject(xcords, ycords, object ID, Facing, 10);//Portals)
Then make a case for it.(e.gcase 8987: if(actionTimer == 0) { sendMessage("massege here"); teleportToX = xcords; teleportToY = ycords; heightLevel = 0; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } break;
~veki~

Read full topic
